channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #48 – Hangout with David L. Hoyt, The Man Who Puzzles America

item.title: By: E Johnson
item.dc:creator: E Johnson
item.description: Thanks for a very informative interview with the interesting and well-known guest, David L. Hoyt, on this show. It's good to learn what app marketings he thinks work and how his team publishes mobile apps using Corona SDK. Please keep up getting such engaging guests as him "occasionally" on your program, giving us a broader and maybe also refreshing perspective of user base, their Corona SDK usage and preferences.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for a very informative interview with the interesting and well-known guest, David L. Hoyt, on this show. It’s good to learn what app marketings he thinks work and how his team publishes mobile apps using Corona SDK. Please keep up getting such engaging guests as him “occasionally” on your program, giving us a broader and maybe also refreshing perspective of user base, their Corona SDK usage and preferences.
